categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: A male individual served as a major in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire. Sometime before 3643 BBY, he encountered the Sith Lord Praven, and the Sith Pureblood took offense to what he saw as a lack of respect on the officer's part. As punishment, Praven choked the major with the Force, breaking the man's neck after forcing an apology out of him.
The Imperial major was first mentioned in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, though the guide did not specify the male's name or species.
